item.title: 微软面经
item.description: 一面 就只是做了一道算法题，漆狗屋问题，可在Geeksforgeeks上找到，原题描述如下： Description Dilpreet wants to paint his dog- Buzo’s home that has n boards with different lengths[A1, A2,…, An]. He hired k painters for this work and each painter takes 1 unit time to paint 1 unit of the board.The problem is to find the minimum time to get this job done under the constraints that any painter will only paint continuous sections of boards, say board {2, 3, 4} or only board {1} or nothing but not board {2, 4, 5}.
